org.robolectric.shadows

Class ShadowMotionEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowMotionEvent

  • Shadow for MotionEvent that uses reflection to create MotionEvent objects, which cannot otherwise be constructed.

    • Constructor Summary
